headline: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) Sees 12% Price Drop Over Last Quarter Amid Strong Earnings
summary: Amidst a turbulent quarter marked by tariff-induced global market downturns, KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) saw a 12% decline in its share price. Despite strong quarterly earnings showing revenue and net income growth, broader market pressures and sector-specific challenges impacted its stock performance. The announcement by President Trump of sweeping tariffs led to a bearish market, with major indices like the Nasdaq entering a bear market, and this undoubtedly put pressure on KLA's share price...
